comment.body: My favorite definition of moral. Moral is just what many people agreed to think as "good", and amoral is simply what many people agreed to think as "bad". So moral is unreliable, unstable, relative. I think it is better to get smarter and smarter, learn things, and think and decide for yourself what is "good" or "bad" for you and other people around.

In russian language there are two different "moral" words most people consider as synonims. I spend about 15 minutes g??gling and didn't find good enough english words. So I will try to explain it other way. Consider there are two different types of moral: inner and outer. Yes, people tend to confuse them, but there are huge differences between inner moral and outer moral. I, for example, often against outer moral (outer moral is usual moral I told in previous comment), but I like inner moral. Let me try to define inner moral. Inner moral is when person defines global/universal rules for himself/herself and tries to stick to those rules even if it contradicts usual (outer moral). Oh, I found great article in russian about differences between those two types of moral (in russian language it is even better - they have two different words for those entities) and I think it is good idea for me to translate it into english and post it... And I did it already. So go check my translation.

I more like game "Cyberia". 1st part I completed on PSX emulator where you can save/load at any moment. It looks like there is no 2nd part for any emulator, so I didn't play 2nd part. Now I know there are two different Cyrebrias: Cyberia with "C" and Syberia with "S". I once tried "Syberia 2" with my friend who sad it is wrong Cyberia. Cyberia has episode where there is a big cooler you have to go through - hero calls it "Slice-o-matic" :-] Syberia 2 has phone on which you can dial any number you wish.
You reminded me this guy at 1:15-1:27 in https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ih9ZM7PoBCc

How to play your game? And pi is not diameter of any circle.

I do not remember name, but there is some short story about situation where reading is illegal! Or it was my imagination... Bah, it is not important. What I want to say reading can be something that government doesn't want to allow you. Only elite can read, other people must be stupid to be under control. Just imagine "you reading a book" is equals "you are criminal"! Even if you just able to read makes you dangerous element of society that "must be eliminated". And one of your "friend"s anytime can call the police and tell them "he can read!", making you live in constant fair. Brrrrr.... thinking about that... Just "brrrr....".

@ulrichard: Fahrenheit 451. Little by little I become interested in it. Too many times I hear something about it. I already knew there is a book and Sega-CD game. Now I know there is a movie which looks like predecessor for "Equilibrium" (where all arts including books are illegal). In that situation I think right order is 1) read the book; 2) watch the movie; 3) play the game. But first I want to finish 2MB in plain txt book I am currently reading.
Bomb Jack at Zx-Spectrum-48Kb.

@Kaffie: Congratulation with your first imposter. Number of imposters is measure of your greatness! There are some flymans in the world which are not me. They like shadows. They can't do anything in 3d, they are 2d, they have less dimensions than you. Bigger you are, more shadow(s) you cast. :-]

In terrorist training camp they treat harmed people, and in the hospital they train terrorists, or vise versa, it is so confusing... Medics in masks with huge scalpel and big injector, and brute men in masks with huge knife and big gun. How you can possibly distinguish them?

@Ranxerox: maybe, because even military intelligence is not smart enough to distinguish medic from terrorist. For example dr. House is a medic, Gordon Freeman looks more like a terrorist in his power armour suit, this youtube video shows that both are the same guy! https://youtu.be/ehCwo7BMdes

It says that I am Architect.
Wow: "Architects are simultaneously the most starry-eyed idealists and the bitterest of cynics, a seemingly impossible conflict". :-] I like to think that this is about me.
"Authority figures do not impress Architects, nor do social conventions or tradition, and no matter how popular something is, if they have a better idea, Architects will stand against anyone they have to in a bid to have it changed". Tests are fun!
That was fun/interesting, keep it up, post more youtube links.

Copyrust people (and structures). I want them wiped out from existence! They suck (in both meanings). I want authors to be supported directly. Find authors and give money to them hand to hand. To hell with 3rd stupid parties.

You're most likely infected by mind parasites. They feed on your attention to things you hate. Make them starve to death. Start to post something you like. Politicians are not the smart people, so do not waste you attention on them. Pay attention to those who deserve it (for example scientists, inventors, developers), those who you like. Attention is some kind of influential essence, you're literally paying it. And when you buy (pay for) something, they make it more and more to sell.
Consider chapter "Unlubricated cooler on a loose".

I think powerful tool is to include to your behaviour following thing. Every time you learn something or experience something, try to remember the source of this knowledge/experience. I try to do this since few years ago, so I think it works. And when you do this, you can even know things, which can be in contradiction to each other, and you can be ok with that. You can teach yourself to be aware from where comes your associations/thoughts. For example: oh, this is from that book, and this is what this guy told me, and this is from that movie where robots bla-bla-bla...
@Musickiller: I think there is enough of corn (or porn, or whatever) in the internet. Why bother to create even more?
@Musickiller: "When book starts merging with the long term..." To prevent this merging.

@Musickiller: although I hate porn (it feels fake, people involved into this process look like they are not enjoying it, but faking it; they are payed for it, they did it thousands hours, it is their routine work), I hate politicians even more. So, I guess, you have my wellcome to post about porn.

Try to play Achron. It will teach you to think in 2D time. I tried to find youtube video, but all I found in 20 minutes doesn't show what I want to tell you. Just play 1st campaign and you will have deep understanding on how time mechanics work. Time manipulation is a part of game mechanics. Achron is basically starcraft with time travel.

About seeing world in 4D. I think trick is in focusing. We/I trained to focus our/my eyes on specific layer of multi-dimensional space (in case it exists). And it is surely hard to refocus your eyes, when your eyes are "locked on target".
@Musickiller: there are 4 campaigns in Achron, but you can access next ones only after completing previous.

@Musickiller: That is strange, I do not remember it was difficult. Is it that mission where you need to come to this facility in 30 minutes and then stay alive for a little? Few thing that might help:
1) There is "game speed" option. Try to play at 10% or 20% with fast time flow.
2) Use more healers: there are soldier-healers, vehicles like Tyr and even aircrafts that can heal.
3) Use more turrets.

@Musickiller: .1. Game speed option is somewhere in menu settings, yes.
.2. When they asked me to survive, I started to build there turrets and other buildings. I do not remember it was so hard. Did you use resources to the south? I'm not sure we talking about same mission. What is number of mission?

I completed v1.5.0.0. version of Achron. Is your version older? There are two different menu: one before you start playing a mission, other is when you're playing a mission. Be sure you can't find "game speed" option in "during mission" menu. I remember clearly, I used it while playing missions. When mission is just started I switched into 10-20%, when I was becoming strong (middle/end) then I was switching into 50% with fast forward mode. Fun thing, when game speed is low, and you watch characters talk to each other, game is ready for that thing. Speech is stretched in time llllliiiiiiikkkkkkkeeee th-th-th-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-t.

About mission 1:7. I remember I came to facility when 1-3 minutes was left, I had a huge army, I built 3-4 turrets there. And I do not remember I had to survive for 10 minutes. I remember it was about 2-3 minutes and wasn't hard at all, so I think I can't help you here. :-[
@Musickiller: Kerrigan from StarCraft1: "Thinking a same thing". :-] https://youtu.be/zjB7683LLM0?t=11
"are you russian" joke. You inspired me to make a joke. Check my latest post.

@Musickiller: I like StarCraft1. I like Kerrigan character. But I do not like StarCraft2, because they changed all main heroes including Kerrigan and Jim Rainor. Worst thing is they changed Kerrigan I like into some typical hollywood "beauty"-girl. Same thing happened when I liked Sonya in Mortal Kombat 1 movie. Then (in Mortal Kombat 2 movie) bastards changed cute and sport-shaped Sonya (by story line she is cop, trained one) into typical hollywood stupid miss-universe which has no intelligence and agility in her appearance!

@Musickiller: about cool story of StarCraft. Before playing StarCraft2 I decided to complete all campaigns in part 1 again. Then, by some inspiration (friend told me he completed some games not by playing, but watching youtube walkthroughs) I refreshed my memory of story line quicker than I thought. Then I just did same thing to StarCraft2 and I do not regretted it. Some guys made "movie" where all dialogues are included, so you do not have to play those game to know the story.
!Offtopic! Please, teach me how to make horizontal lines in messages.

-"You can do/make any thing/stuff, but always there will be people who will believe in you. Main thing is to find this thing/stuff inside yourself".

Censorship, bah!.. Little group of stupid people wants to keep large group of people in even more stupid state of mind. Thanks for idea. The Stupidity equals Censorship. ZeroNet is danger for The Stupidity. Sounds inspiring. How about that: "China officially marked itself as stupid."?
@Taarezameenpar: just stop to identify yourself with something you do not like, "shame" feeling will go away in no time. @Musickiller: +1!

.1. Great story, I enjoyed reading.
.2. Yeah, "teaching" is separate skill. And it's a "big deal". Some time it's hard to understand position of recipient who "doesn't understand" when it seems obvious for you... I mean, it's hard to understand how possible it is not to understand something you consider obvious. I have some experience of failing to teach "obvious" things to someone (it happened many times and still happens). And be aware of "Stupid" or fake-"Stupid" people who chose not to understand you but who're making fake show how they "want" to understand and they "can't".
.3. You're the man! Be able to say "No!" under family pressure is something not every one can do.
Use your friends as testers. They can do something that surprise you... and reveal bugs in the process. :-]
Hang in there.
